mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.pid,r.name,(CASE WHEN s.role_id IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) AS checked, (CASE r.pid WHEN 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) AS open FROM sys_resource r LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource s ON r.id=s.resource_id AND s.role_id=#{roleId} WHERE r.deleted=0 AND r.status=0 ORDER BY r.sort DESC
